121722.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Welcome to Divine House. We've been
expecting you. Please have a seat.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121722.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ã‚ˆã†ã“ãã€€å ã„ã®é¤¨ã¸ã€‚

121723.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>So, first of all, can you tell us your
name and what you do?<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121723.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>ã€Œãã‚Œã§ã¯ã¾ãšã€€ã‚ãªãŸã®ãŠåå‰ã¨
ã€€ãŠä»•äº‹ã‚’ã€€æ•™ãˆã¦ãã ã•ã„ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121724.en:
Hi, my name is Sarashina. My name is Sarashina. By order of King Kamiharmui, I am traveling with my
companions to investigate demon miasma around the world.

121725.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Sarashina. Today, this fortune teller
<pc> will lead you to the
solution of your problem.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121725.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>ã€Œã‚µãƒ©ã‚·ãƒŠã•ã‚“ã§ã™ã­ã€‚
ã€€æœ¬æ—¥ã¯ã€€ã“ã®å ã„å¸«ã€€<pc>ãŒ
ã€€ã‚ãªãŸã®æ‚©ã¿ã‚’ã€€è§£æ±ºã¸ã¨å°ãã¾ã™ã€‚<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121726.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Come on, be at peace, relax. Whatever
it is, we are here to help you. Tell
us <pc> about your problems.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121727.en:
<start_lip_sync n00683 _normal m00001>Yes. So, did you know that demon
miasma is continuing to spread
throughout the world?<stop_lip_animation n00683 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121728.en:
I am in a state of unprecedented crisis. I am constantly thinking that I must investigate the situation and
report back to my king.

121729.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>I see. So you are worried about the
world crisis. Is that right?<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121730.en:
Oh, no. What I wanted to talk to you about was the problem of human relations, or rather, my colleague
Inaniwa.

121731.en:
Inaniwa is a man of his own pace! When he gets absorbed in his work, he loses sight of his surroundings and acts on
his own.

121732.en:
What was the point of setting out on this journey together? We have yet to accomplish anything of note, and our
king is dismayed and disappointed.

121733.en:
<start_lip_sync n00683 _normal m00001>I don't think I can get along with him
in the future. I think I should just
go back to Eltona by myself!<stop_lip_animation n00683 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121734.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>There are always countless options
open to one's path.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121735.en:
You can leave without telling him. But if you visited Divine House because you were lost in your mind, you must
have other hidden thoughts.
121735.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>ã€Œã‚ãªãŸã¯ã€€å½¼ã«é»™ã£ã¦ã€€å¸°ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã„ã„ã€‚

121736.en: <start_lip_sync n00683 _normal m00001>I'm not sure.<stop_lip_animation n00683 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121737.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>I understand. The Serepia Card will
lead you to your true heart.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121738.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Come on <pc>. Close to
Sarashina's heart. Ask HER to draw a
card.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

142640.en:
<pc> lays out a Serepia Card
on the table with a thought for
Sarashina.

142641.en: <start_lip_sync n00683 _normal m00001>I'll pull it then.<stop_lip_animation n00683 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121739.en:
Sarashina drew the ''lovers'' card from
the Serepia Card!

121740.en:
What a surprise! The card that
Sarashina drew speaks to <pc>
in a mysterious voice.

121741.en:
Shoot straight at the target on your chest with an honest heart. Defeat <%sev_que_name0> by <%nev_que_t_num0>.
Then the door to his heart will be opened.

142642.en:
The card that Sarashina has just drawn will be imbued with special power by the fortune teller's secret technique,
Arcana Serapia.

121742.en:
When this appears in front of you again, guided by the lovers' cards, all your problems will
be solved.

121743.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Please trust in our divination and
wait with peace of mind.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121743.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>ã€Œã©ã†ã‹ã€€ç§ãŸã¡ã®å ã„ã‚’ä¿¡ã˜ã¦
ã€€å¿ƒå®‰ã‚‰ã‹ã«ã€€ãŠå¾…ã¡ãã ã•ã„â€¦â€¦ã€‚<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121744.en:
Okay, I understand. I will be waiting for you on the sofa of the Depository here in Town of Orphea. I look forward
to working with you.

121745.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Now <pc>. You are now going
to give your power to Serepia Card in
order to solve Sarashina's problem.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121746.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>The card that Sarashina just drew must
have imposed some kind of trial on
you. Do you remember what it said?<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121747.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>I see. If so, please let me defeat
<%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> in any
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> region.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ãªã‚‹ã»ã©ã€‚ã§ã—ãŸã‚‰ã€€ã©ã®åœ°åŸŸã«ç”Ÿæ¯ã™ã‚‹

121748.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Near here, I have seen them in the
back of the Orppa Underground Caves in
the Orphea Region East.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>ã€Œã“ã®è¿‘ãã ã¨ã€€ã‚ªãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚§ã‚¢åœ°æ–¹æ±ã«ã‚ã‚‹

ã€€è¦‹ã‹ã‘ãŸã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã‚ˆã€‚<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121749.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>When you overcome the trial, the
Serepia Card will have special power.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121750.en:
After that, go to Ms. Sarashina alone as a fortune teller and hold up the Serepia Card that contains the power
of fortune.
121750.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>ã€Œãã®å¾Œã€€å ã„å¸«ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹çŠ¶æ…‹ã§ã€€ã²ã¨ã‚Šã§

121751.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>From there, the arcana serapia of
tarot divination will be in full
force.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121752.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Sometimes, you may be in danger of
losing your life. Please be prepared
for anything that may happen.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121752.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>ã€Œæ™‚ã«ã€€å‘½ã®å±é™ºã«ã€€ã•ã‚‰ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

121753.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Well then, I look forward to working
with you. Let us help you with your
problems with our fortune-telling!<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121755.en:
<start_lip_sync m04404 _normal m00001>Ano hito ni kiraware takunai
kizukitakunai. Demo.<stop_lip_animation m04404 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121756.en: <start_lip_sync m04404 _normal m00001>Hitori ha sabishii yo!<stop_lip_animation m04404 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121757.en:
<start_lip_sync m04404 _normal m00001>Sabishiiyo-ooo! Kurushiiyo-ooooo! Kana
shiiinoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!!!!<stop_lip_animation m04404 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121758.en: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Looks like it worked.<cs_pchero>...<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121759.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>You used the power of the Serepia Card
to open Sarashina's heart, and I was
able to come into her heart.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121760.en:
What if the person I love rejects me? I'm afraid to express my honest feelings. Then let's just go ahead and
keep our feelings secret.
121760.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>ã€Œâ€¦â€¦å¥½ããªäººã«æ‹’çµ¶ã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚‰ã€€ã©ã†ã—ã‚ˆã†ï¼Ÿ
ã€€ç´ ç›´ãªæ°—æŒã¡ã‚’ã€€ä¼ãˆã‚‹ã®ãŒæ€–ã„ã€‚ã ã£ãŸã‚‰
ã€€ã„ã£ãã®ã“ã¨ã€€æƒ³ã„ã¯ã€€ç§˜ã‚ã¦ã—ã¾ãŠã†â€¦â€¦ã€‚<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121761.en:
What you see now is Sarashina's Dark Mind, the embodiment of her weak heart that was born as her feelings for Mr.
Inaniwa grew.

121762.en:
Thus, by entering the mind of the counselor, challenging the Dark Mind to a direct confrontation, and
fighting it off, the cause of one's distress can be eliminated.

121763.en:
A revolutionary form of divination that overturns conventional wisdom. That is what Arcana Therapia is all
about.

121764.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>But now that the Dark Mind has been
erased, Sarashina will have a change
of heart. And<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121765.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>This is a pure pearl, a beautiful
gemstone born from the human heart,
purified using Arcana serapia.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121766.en:
The ultimate goal of fortune teller is to solve the problems of people all over the world. To eliminate people's
worries and sufferings.

121767.en:
This pure pearl is what is needed to one day free all the people of the world from their troubles. That's why
I collect them.

121768.en:
thank you for your hard workI am very happy to see you taking a solid step toward becoming a full- fledged fortune teller. You have taken
a steady step toward becoming a full- fledged fortune teller.

121769.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>It's time to go back to your world.
Please check on Sarashina and then
come back to Divine House.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
